items.sentence: Tom has read every book in his school\'s library.
Have you ever seen Tom and Mary dancing together?
Have you ever seen an unidentified flying object?
Have you forgotten the true meaning of Christmas?
Have you learned all the letters in the alphabet?
It\'s possible that Tom isn\'t telling the truth.
It\'s really dark in here. I can\'t see anything.
In 1979, Mother Teresa won the Nobel Peace Prize.
Is it really important to you why I quit smoking?
Is there anything we can do to minimize the risk?
